channel.title: How do i use different clients with different sources
channel.description:
Ok, well i have downloaded different servers, and different clients, im gonna start a project with the Delta Base, and i hate the client, how do i use other clients? (E.g Bluurs Client)
In Server.ini, i have changed ClientRequired=1 To ColientRequired=0
Is it because the client has customs set on it?

item.title: How do i use different clients with different sources

Read full topic
